meta.description: Side effects from vaccines are common; they can be mild and transient, or they can be life-threatening, either right after the procedure or years down the road.

title: How to Minimize Adverse Vaccine Reactions in Your Pet
cleaned_text: Establishing protective immunity in pets is important for preventing infectious diseases, but many pet owners don’t understand that more vaccines do not equate to more immunity

opengraph.title: How to Minimize Adverse Vaccine Reactions in Your Pet
opengraph.description: Side effects from vaccines are common; they can be mild and transient, or they can be life-threatening, either right after the procedure or years down the road.
